title: Skarner Main
body:
Pls nerf Skarner main q bikaus my schwein feift and q is 2 freaki fuckin strong amazing its even stronger than ziggen and my mobile telefon is looking sooo good 
Evertime if my is in using my q all schreibtisch is wackeling like an earthquake and i like pizza gj gg ez 
Of korse ei kän häf job ez
MfG Skarner Main
